modules.description: Converts ANSI escape codes to RGB color values. Operates on custom ansi type and returns a tuple of integers representing red, green, and blue components. Used to render terminal colors in graphical interfaces or text formatting tools.
Calculates the D65 illuminant in XYZ color space. Operates on spectral data and returns a normalized XYZ value. Used to standardize color measurements under daylight conditions.

Converts between standard RGB values and linear RGB representations, and transforms linear RGB into XYZ color space coordinates. Operates on tuples representing RGB colors, linear RGB values, and XYZ color space data. Used in color correction pipelines and accurate color space conversions for graphics applications.

Converts XYZ color values to linear RGB and UV color spaces, and computes LUV values with or without a reference white point. Operates on XYZ and LUV data types, as well as UV tuples. Used to transform color data for display rendering and color space conversions in graphics pipelines.

Converts CIELUV color values to XYZ color space using a reference white point or a default, and blends two CIELUV colors based on a mix ratio. Operates on tuples representing CIELUV and XYZ color values. Useful for color interpolation and conversion in graphic processing pipelines.

Combines two RGB colors using a specified mix ratio to produce a new color. Operates on RGB values represented as tuples of red, green, and blue components. Used to create smooth color transitions in graphical applications.

Provides functions for converting and blending colors across RGB, HSL, and CMYK color spaces, including interpolation and opacity handling. Operates on custom data types representing color values with channels for red, green, blue, hue, saturation, lightness, cyan, magenta, yellow, and key. Used to generate smooth color transitions in graphical applications and to compute mixed color values in design tools.

Converts ANSI, RGB, XYZ, and CIELUV color values to various representations, including linear RGB, UV, and LUV, while supporting color blending and interpolation. Processes spectral data to calculate standardized XYZ values and transforms between color spaces for accurate rendering and color correction. Enables operations such as converting terminal ANSI codes to RGB, blending RGB colors with a mix ratio, and converting CIELUV to XYZ using reference white points. Facilitates color space transformations and interpolation in graphics pipelines and text formatting tools.
